mapper.update: update driver set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_no = #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drive_type = #{driveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, on_job = #{onJob,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, phone, sex, plate_no, company, drive_type, address, birth, nation, on_job, isdel from driver where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, phone, sex, plate_no, company, drive_type, address, birth, nation, on_job, isdel from driver
